title: spazzdla
author: spazzdla
content: Townstar - A city building game.  Win NFTS and crypto in comps.Axie Infinity - Card type game like hearthstoneSpider tanks - 3 v 3 tank battles win Silk when you win a match.  Can rent NFTS to earn or buy you own and earn with them.https://shogun.lol/  I haven't played it yet unsure of how it is.  They have no discord so I have yet to connect my wallet to it.Gods unchained - Card type game like hearthstoneshootgunnft - phone battle royal game Anyone else have more I'll add them.Anyone play any NFT games?

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Have you forgotten about CryptoKitties, one of the first? Or do you not consider it a game in that sense?We also have The Sandbox Metaverse, where players can build, own and trade their gaming assets as NFTs. https://www.sandbox.game/en/about/
